EmailTemplate.name: 202104_Supplier-Comms_Agile-VP-Survey_Email_Operational.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Wants Your Input | Supplier Readiness Assessment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell is accelerating New Product Introduction (NPI) development by working to dramatically reduce development cycle time and sustain reduced lead times for new parts entering production. This transformation is a key opportunity for both Honeywell and our suppliers to better serve our customers through increased speed to market, getting world-class products in the hands of our customers faster than ever before.
To make this possible, we are counting on our supply base to play a strategic role in our mutual success. To help us determine supplier readiness, please take a moment to complete this short 7 question survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/BXW3BWS]]>, and a Honeywell representative will contact you to discuss the details of this initiative.
Thank you in advance for your participation.
Bobby Sohi Honeywell Aerospace Sr. Director, ISC NPI Sourcing TAKE THE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/BXW3BWS]]>
